overview: Featuring six explicit short films by Erika Lust and guest directors shot around the world from an all femme superhero threesome, to a very hot ode to non-penetrative sex, plus two intimate sex documentaries self-shot by performers at home during lockdown. Included: Superfemmes; Rituals; An Intimate Portrait of Kail Sudhra; Skin is Skin; Can You See Me?; Sex & Love in the Love of Quarantine.
title: XConfessions 23
